sense.gloss: to get tired of, to lose interest in, to be fed up with, to have enough

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は|あきる|↑野↑↓の↓↑市↑↓し↓に↑観光↑↓かんこう↓に↑行↑↓い↓きたいです。
sdata.e: I want to see the sights in Akiruno city.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はダンスに↑決↑↓けっ↓して↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|ことはありません。
sdata.e: I never get sick of dancing.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はすぐその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|だろう。
sdata.e: He will soon be weary of the task.

sdata.j: ↑要↑↓よう↓するに↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑何↑↓なに↓にでも↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|のだ。
sdata.e: In a word, he tires of everything.

sdata.j: ただ、↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓だとさすがに↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|だろう。もっと↑料理↑↓りょうり↓のバリエーションを↑増↑↓ふ↓やさないと。
sdata.e: It's just if we have it every day we're bound to get fed up with it. I must increase the variety of my cooking.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You get tired of a beautiful woman after three days. You get used to an ugly woman after three days.

sdata.j: ↑刺身↑↓さしみ↓もこう↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓だと↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|な。
sdata.e: If you eat it every day like this, then you become tired even of sashimi.

sdata.j: ↑自閉症↑↓じへいしょう↓の↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|ことを↑知↑↓し↓らない。
↑自閉症↑↓じへいしょう↓の↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|ことを↑知↑↓し↓らない。
sdata.e: Autistic children don't know what boredom is.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You'll get tired of a beautiful woman after three days, but you'll get used to an ugly one in the same amount of time.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: In three days you get tired of a beautiful woman while in the same amount of time you get used to an ugly one.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You get tired of a beautiful woman in three days, and you get used to an ugly woman in three days.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: We get tired of beautiful women in three days, but in three days, we get used to ugly women.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You'll get tired of a beautiful woman after three days, but you'll get used to an ugly one in the same amount of time.

sdata.e: In three days you get tired of a beautiful woman while in the same amount of time you get used to an ugly one.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You get tired of a beautiful woman in three days, and you get used to an ugly woman in three days.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑3↑↓みっ↓↑日↑↓か↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: We get tired of beautiful women in three days, but in three days, we get used to ugly women.

sdata.j: ↑美人↑↓びじん↓は↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|。ブスは↑三日↑↓みっか↓で↑慣↑↓な↓れる。
sdata.e: You get tired of a beautiful woman after three days. You get used to an ugly woman after three days.

sdata.j: もっと↑続↑↓つづ↓けられるけど、↑飽↑↓|あ↓きる|よね。
sdata.e: I could go on, but I don't want to bore you.
